paper_abstract: The FuTI-library is a collection of classes and methods for representing and manipulating fuzzy time intervals. Fuzzy time intervals are represented as polygons over integer coordinates. FuTI is an open source C++ library with many advanced operations and highly optimised algorithms. Version 1.0 is now available from the URL http://www.pms.ifi.lmu.de/CTTN/FuTI.
paper_title: Fuzzy time intervals system description of the FuTI-library
